positive_examples: This is an example of salt.
We observed salt in this context.
A typical case of salt would involve these features.
The concept of salt applies here.
Cubic crystals of sodium chloride that form naturally through evaporation of seawater or salt lakes.
negative_examples: This is an example of snowflake, not salt.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Snowflake, or other types of Crystal

definition: A crystalline compound, typically sodium chloride, used for seasoning and preservation.
